dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Rodney Agatep [mailto:agatep@celini.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 29, 2005 3:34 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com;
legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: 'Rodney Agatep'; 'Bill Chang'
Subject: Copyright Infringement

Hello,

It seems that the website: http://www.taktaz.com which you are hosting
contains images of our material that they have not licenced.  We have tried
to contact them to remove the material but they did not respond to our
emails.  Can you please contact them to remove the material or we will have
to take legal action.

The material that has infringed on copy right are the images:
http://www.taktaz.com/education/images/position1.jpg
http://www.taktaz.com/education/images/position19.jpg
http://www.taktaz.com/education/images/position2.jpg

our member sites:
http://www.sexpositionsecrets.com/Tour/

Can you please inform us on when you have contacted them.

Thank-you...

Rod Agatep - agatep@celini.com
President
